text: An Almost Perfect Affair is a 1979 American romantic comedy movie directed by Michael Ritchie and starring Keith Carradine, Monica Vitti, Raf Vallone, Christian De Sica, Dick Anthony Williams, Katya Berger, Andy Ho, Susan Gilmore. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1979 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Michael Ritchie Category:Movies set in France
title: An Almost Perfect Affair
